text: All API endpoints must require authentication. Anonymous access is prohibited except for health check endpoints explicitly listed in Appendix A. Authentication tokens must be validated on every request. Tokens expire after 24 hours of inactivity or 7 days absolute, whichever comes first.

Personally identifiable information (PII) must be encrypted at rest using AES-256 or equivalent. PII includes but is not limited to: full names, email addresses, phone numbers, physical addresses, government identification numbers, and financial account numbers. Encryption keys must be rotated every 90 days.
